gt_text: New Season Drop! Gear Up for Winter Up to 50% Off All Cold-Weather Gear Built for snow Free shipping this week Shop Now
juding_criteria:
Here is a list of every concrete visual element that the final image must contain:

*   Overall sharp, energetic cartoon art style
*   Primary color scheme: icy blue, white, bright red
*   Title text: "Gear Up for Winter"
*   Bold font for title
*   Uppercase letters for title
*   Sans-serif font for title
*   Title position in top left
*   Slightly angled title
*   Red ribbon banner (positioned above title)
*   Text "New Season Drop!" on red ribbon banner
*   Bold, black stamp-style text (positioned below title)
*   Text "Up to 50% Off All Cold-Weather Gear" within stamp-style text
*   Cartoon figures snowboarding
*   Cartoon figures skiing
*   Snowy mountain
*   Scattered snow goggles (around lodge)
*   Scattered snow boots (around lodge)
*   Scattered snow helmets (around lodge)
*   Lodge building
*   Circular logo (positioned in top right corner)
*   Bottom text element: "Built for snow"
*   Bottom text element: "Free shipping this week"
*   "Shop Now" badge (in bottom content area)
*   Arrow icon (on "Shop Now" badge)
